songs.title: Talk (François K Dub)
songs.lyrics:
Then I Take A Picture Of Something You See
You See…
You See…
You See…
You See…
In The Future…
In The Future…
In The Future…
In The Future…
In The Future Where Will I Be?

Oh, Please Talk To Me

Can You Fill The Colors Missing You Need?
Will I Ever Get The Answer I Need?
Oh, Please Talk To Me

Please Talk
To Me
